original_text: And they named the city Dan, after the name of Dan their ancestor, who was born to Israel; but the name of the city was Laish at the first.
korean_text: 이스라엘에게서 태어난 그들의 조상 단의 이름을 따라 그 성읍을 단이라 하니라 그 성읍의 본 이름은 라이스였더라

sentences.original_text: And they named the city Dan
after the name of Dan their ancestor
but the name of the city was Laish at the first
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 도시의 이름은 처음에는 라이스였습니다
